overview: Hope Harper - Hope's stepdad tries tot get her out of bed for school. Lucy Doll - This naughty schoolgirl gets caught sneaking candy. Megan Sage - Getting in trouble at school again means another spanking from stepdad, but it only leaves Megan giggling and horny. Evelin - Evelin is snooping but Fernando catches her. Elizabeth Jolie - Elizabeth is determined to steal her roommate away from his girlfriend.
tagline: Sometimes punishments feel really, really good!
title: Bad Teens Punished 3
